      public void testMovement()
      Tests the movement of the Obstacle object.
      Tests that the X and Y coordinates change when the move method is called.

    • testSettingOfX

      public void testSettingOfX()
      Tests the setting of the X coordinate of the Obstacle object when the conditions in the act method are met.
      Conditions tested: 
           if (getX()>600 && speed>0)
            setX(-200);

    • testSettingOfX2

      public void testSettingOfX2()
      Tests the setting of the X coordinate of the Obstacle object when the conditions in the act method are met.
      Conditions tested: 
          if (getX()<-50 && speed<0)
            setX(600);

    • testGettingObjectController

      public void testGettingObjectController()
      Tests the getObjectController method to ensure that the method returns null as Obstacle does not have a controller.

    • testObstacleParent

      public void testObstacleParent()
      Tests that the Obstacle object has a parent when it is added to the stage. Tests that the parent is the MyStage world that the Obstacle is added to.

    • testImageSmoothnessAndRatio

      public void testImageSmoothnessAndRatio()
      Tests the Obstacle object's image at instantiation is smooth and has a preserved ratio.

    • testImageWidthAndHeight

      public void testImageWidthAndHeight()
      Tests that the width and height of the Obstacle object are correctly set.

      Tests that the Obstacle objects' image is correctly set.

      Tests that the Obstacle objects' image changes when an image is set.

      Tests the adding of Obstacle objects to the stage.
